Study Title: Capecitabine in the Perioperative Treatment of Rectal Cancer
Brief Summary: This study compares capecitabine with standard 5-FU in the perioperative treatment of locally advanced rectal cancer.
Secondary Outcome Measures: disease-free survival (DFS), 3-year DFS|Local recurrence rate, Percentage of patient with local recurrence, 5 years
Study Design: Allocation: RANDOMIZED|Intervention Model: PARALLEL|Masking: NONE|Primary Purpose: TREATMENT
